channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: DINOv2: Learning Robust Visual Features without Supervision
item.description: The recent breakthroughs in natural language processing for model pretraining on large quantities of data have opened the way for similar foundation models in computer vision.

item.title: Inpaint Anything: Segment Anything Meets Image Inpainting
item.description: We are also very willing to help everyone share and promote new projects based on our Inpaint Anything (IA).

item.title: A Method for Animating Children's Drawings of the Human Figure
item.description: Children's drawings have a wonderful inventiveness, creativity, and variety to them.

item.title: Multimodal C4: An Open, Billion-scale Corpus of Images Interleaved With Text
item.description: We release Multimodal C4 (mmc4), an augmentation of the popular text-only c4 corpus with images interleaved.

item.title: OpenAssistant Conversations -- Democratizing Large Language Model Alignment
item.description: The corpus is a product of a worldwide crowd-sourcing effort involving over 13, 500 volunteers.

item.title: CAMEL: Communicative Agents for "Mind" Exploration of Large Scale Language Model Society
item.description: To address the challenges of achieving autonomous cooperation, we propose a novel communicative agent framework named role-playing.

item.title: HuaTuo: Tuning LLaMA Model with Chinese Medical Knowledge
item.description: Large Language Models (LLMs), such as the LLaMA model, have demonstrated their effectiveness in various general-domain natural language processing (NLP) tasks.

item.title: Chameleon: Plug-and-Play Compositional Reasoning with Large Language Models
item.description: Large language models (LLMs) have achieved remarkable progress in various natural language processing tasks with emergent abilities.

item.title: Consistency Models
item.description: To overcome this limitation, we propose consistency models, a new family of generative models that achieve high sample quality without adversarial training.

item.title: Tool Learning with Foundation Models
item.description: Considering the lack of a systematic tool learning evaluation in prior works, we experiment with 17 representative tools and show the potential of current foundation models in skillfully utilizing tools.

item.title: Transformer-Based Visual Segmentation: A Survey
item.description: Recently, transformers, a type of neural network based on self-attention originally designed for natural language processing, have considerably surpassed previous convolutional or recurrent approaches in various vision processing tasks.

item.title: Segment Everything Everywhere All at Once
item.description: Inspired by the development of prompt-based universal interfaces for LLMs, this paper presents SEEM, a promptable, interactive model for Segmenting Everything Everywhere all at once in an image.

item.title: Text2Performer: Text-Driven Human Video Generation
item.description: In this work, we present Text2Performer to generate vivid human videos with articulated motions from texts.

item.title: Self-Instruct: Aligning Language Model with Self Generated Instructions
item.description: Applying our method to vanilla GPT3, we demonstrate a 33% absolute improvement over the original model on Super-NaturalInstructions, on par with the performance of InstructGPT_001, which is trained with private user data and human annotations.

item.title: Chinese Open Instruction Generalist: A Preliminary Release
item.description: Instruction tuning is widely recognized as a key technique for building generalist language models, which has attracted the attention of researchers and the public with the release of InstructGPT~\citep{ouyang2022training} and ChatGPT\footnote{\url{https://chat. openai. com/}}.

item.title: LongForm: Optimizing Instruction Tuning for Long Text Generation with Corpus Extraction
item.description: Our models outperform 10x larger language models without instruction tuning on various tasks such as story/recipe generation and long-form question answering.

item.title: SiLK -- Simple Learned Keypoints
item.description: Keypoint detection & descriptors are foundational tech-nologies for computer vision tasks like image matching, 3D reconstruction and visual odometry.

item.title: Understanding INT4 Quantization for Transformer Models: Latency Speedup, Composability, and Failure Cases
item.description: Improving the deployment efficiency of transformer-based language models has been challenging given their high computation and memory cost.

item.title: Efficient and Effective Text Encoding for Chinese LLaMA and Alpaca
item.description: Large Language Models (LLMs), such as ChatGPT and GPT-4, have revolutionized natural language processing research and demonstrated potential in Artificial General Intelligence (AGI).

item.title: A Survey of Large Language Models
item.description: To discriminate the difference in parameter scale, the research community has coined the term large language models (LLM) for the PLMs of significant size.
